document_data.name: ''Raegen's Sword''
document_data.mainbody: ''Raegen's sword'' was a rare magical [[longsword]] blessed by [[Helm]] himself that belonged to an adventurer and mercenary [[Raegen Brunegar]] ''circa'' ''[[1372 DR]]''.
document_data.Powers: Blessed by the God of Guardians, ''Raegen's sword'' was imbued with holy enchantments that were deadly to [[undead]]. Apart from additional divine damage done to the undead, this sword possessed a ''+1'' enchantment, had a keen edge that made critical strikes especially divesting, and glowed with dim yellow light in {{SI|10'|'"|long=yes}} radius.
document_data.History: Raegen Brunegar wielded her sword famously using it while adventuring with the hero of [[Daggerford]] in [[1372 DR]], aiding in stopping [[Zhentarim]]'s plans of taking over the city, stopping a powerful [[fiend]] [[Gorgomorz]] from laying waste to the city, and rescuing the [[Pwyll Daggerford|Duke]] and [[Bronwyn Daggerford|Duchess]] of Daggerford.
